name: QueryPie
long_description:
QueryPie is a leading access governance platform that provides unified, Zero Trust-based security for managing and monitoring access to databases, servers, Kubernetes clusters, and internal web applications. 
Trusted by over 130 enterprises and fully compliant with global standards such as ISMS, PCI-DSS, and GDPR, QueryPie enables organizations to implement secure and scalable data access control. 
With built-in support for AI infrastructure, QueryPie connects LLMs, AI agents, and Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers through a centralized control layerâ€”ensuring all automated workflows across SaaS tools, cloud environments, and internal systems are secure, auditable, and compliant. 
Featuring native MCPs and verified integrations with tools like Slack, GitHub, and AWS, QueryPie is the enterprise-ready solution for governing AI-powered access in modern data environments.
